text: With an assist from America's current (TV) president. Hillary Clinton sat down for an interview with Ellen, and they had lots to chat about—including what it's like to be played by Saturday Night Live's Kate McKinnon and the game "Heads up." Ellen invited the current "POTUS," Scandal's Tony Goldwyn, to play a round with them.   Best team ever. Watch the full clip:
title: Press Release - Hillary Clinton and Ellen Teamed Up For a Game of Charades, and It Was Hilarious
